biography: Tomas, a familiar name at the Hector Trophée from Espoo Ringside Golf, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. While his presence on the course is marked by a quiet intensity, those who know him speak of a dry wit and a penchant for elaborate pranks off the green.

His journey in the tournament includes 3 past appearances, where he has consistently demonstrated a strategic mind and a steady hand. Although the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him, Tomas's contributions to the competitive spirit of the event are undeniable.

Considered retired from the Hector Trophée, Tomas will unlikely participate in Hector Trophée 2025 unless there are last-minute changes. His absence would mark the end of an era, and he would be missed.
